name: ERC721 NFT token receiver
description: Contracts implementing this interface are marking themselves as safe to receive NFTs.

functionDecorators.name: On token received
functionDecorators.description: Handles the receipt of an NFT.

parameterDecorators.name: Operator
parameterDecorators.description: The wallet which initiated the transfer

parameterDecorators.name: From
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token

parameterDecorators.name: Token Id
parameterDecorators.description: The NFT identifier which is being transferred

parameterDecorators.name: Data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data attached with the transfer, with no specified format

returnDecorators.name: Function selector
returnDecorators.description: By the proposed interface, here the function must return selector of this function.
